title: february 5: the constitution of Mexico (with Alexander 23)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the creation of the Mexican constitution. We also hear from a special musical guest, Alexander23! Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
